name: Dark of the East Wood
description:
Dark of the East Wood

Sophia and her friends embark on a quest to the dark of the East Wood in search of a lost sister. Join them in their journey and light the way with offerings to the dead in a misty forest filled with shadows and monsters.

Features
  • 10+ enemy types
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Atmospheric effects
  • Made in RPG Maker MV
  • 5-15 minutes of play time.
